Dm_ZO_0010_09: <sp:3:0:2:0601><snd:Encourage_01><sp:0:2:2:7d00>You must leave this place to me!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Dm_ZO_0010_32:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:ShidoAizuchi_01>You did it, Link! Take that, foul beast of
the sludge!
Dm_ZO_0010_46:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughL_01>Off we go, Link!<sp:5:1:0> To the pillar of light!


I shall blaze on ahead, my friend!
Dm_ZO_0010_47: <sp:0:2:2:7d00>I will not give in to this fear!<sp:0:4:0>Nor forsake my trust in you!<sp:0:4:0>I leave this place to you, my love.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Dm_ZO_0010_35:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:ShidoImpressed_00>Thank goodness.<sp:5:1:0> Lady Yona, if something
had happened to you...<sp:5:1:0> I...

Ahem, in any case, it is possible that
another monster will appear. I suggest
that you return to the domain at once.
Dm_ZO_0010_48:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_00>Hee-hee...


It seems Sidon has finally put his doubts
behind him and returned to his usual
fearless self. I am so glad.
Dm_ZO_0010_10: <sp:3:0:2:0001>Like my old self...<sp:5:1:0> Like I always do...
Dm_ZO_0010_49:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Sad_00>All this time he was clinging to regret over
being unable to save his precious sister,
Mipha... My poor, tormented Sidon.
And to think he was unknowingly
paralyzed from taking action because
he feared losing me as well...
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>Yet he has overcome this trial and placed
his faith in me. At last, the Sidon I know
and love has come back to me.
Dm_ZO_0010_37:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Care_01>But you are the prince of the Zora.<sp:5:1:0>
One day, you will lead the people of
your beloved domain.
Dm_ZO_0010_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Sweet Sidon... Do not get lost in the past.<sp:5:1:0>
You must keep moving ever onward. Just
follow your heart, as you always do!
Dm_ZO_0010_38:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>I can see right through you, whether you
want me to or not. You are yielding to the
fear of losing someone you love again.
You must overcome your past and face
whatever the future holds with courage.
Dm_ZO_0010_39:
I truly appreciate that you worry so for
my safety. It speaks to the kindness in
your heart.
Dm_ZO_0010_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>Thank you for the sentiment, Sidon.
However, more importantly, we must
consider what Sir Link spoke of earlier.
The pillar of light that he said appeared
at the reservoir begs to be investigated.

This may be our opportunity to learn the
cause of the sludge falling from the sky
or even Princess Zelda's whereabouts.
<sp:3:0:2:0601><snd:TalkPositive_00>Leave this place to us, dearest Sidon.
Your friend needs your help getting to
the bottom of this mystery.
Dm_ZO_0010_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive_01>It is all right. <sp:5:1:0>I swear it. <sp:5:1:0>I am not
going anywhere.
Dm_ZO_0010_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Sad_01>W-well... Of course it would be best for
me to accompany him.<sp:5:1:0> However, I cannot
leave you alone in this dangerous place!
Dm_ZO_0010_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Care_02>Did you not entrust this task to us
already?<sp:5:1:0> We will not be on our own
for long. We shall be just fine.
Dm_ZO_0010_17:
<sp:0:2:2:5000>I was giving in to my fear of once more losing
someone I love...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Dm_ZO_0010_42:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_01>Link...<sp:5:1:0> Please take good care of my
dear Sidon. He is the sun in my sky.
